modName: Various bat files to max out different skills and perks
summary: Don\'t want to spend hours manually adding perks and increasing skills? This will save you time!
descriptionHtml:
Each command will max out the respective skill and add all perks in the corresponding tree.

Just type \"bat ------\" in the console (press ~ key) and replace ------ with the command you want to execute.

Full list:

max_allskills
Pretty self-explanatory, will take you to level 81 with all perks and all skills at 100

max_combat
Will give all perks and max all skill levels in the Combat skill class (Archery, Block, Heavy Armor, One-danded, Smithing, Two-handed)

max_magic
Will give all perks and max all skill levels in the Magic skill class (Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Enchanting, Illusion, Restoration)

max_stealth
Will give all perks and max all skill levels in the Stealth skill class (Alchemy, Light Armor, Lockpicking, Pickpocket, Sneak, Speech)

individual skills:

max_alchemy
max_alteration
max_archery 
max_block
max_conjuration
max_destruction
max_enchanting
max_heavyarmor
max_illusion
max_lightarmor
max_lockpicking
max_onehanded
max_pickpocket
max_restoration
max_smithing
max_sneak
max_speech
max_stealth
max_twohanded



****NOTE**** 
Some of the console commands are not the same as you would think by looking at the skill tree, ie the Archery skill is actually called \"Marksman\" in the console. The commands above ARE the same as the skill tree, so what you see is what you get.





INSTALLATION

Extract the .txt files to your Skyrim directory, probably looks like C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Make sure the FILES are in the \\Data folder, not just the \"maxmod\" or \"Skyrim maxmod\" folder.
author: The GingerBreadMan
